channel.title: Rune Migrant!
channel.description:
i have been working on this server for a long time. its original base is insanityx but its an older insanity. [img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/7149/bannerfz.png[/img]
click link to play[url=http://runemigrant.webs.com/play-webclient]http://runemigrant.webs.com/play-webclient[/url]
FEATURES
[b][u]HOURLY CHEST[/u][/b]: each hour of playing time you get to open a chest that will give you a random amount of money from 100k-4m and also a random item including dragon masks, animal masks, dragon (or), dragon (spk), 3rd age, colored whips, colored dark bows, pet scrolls wich i will tell you about down further. and tons more.
[u][b]PET SCROLLS[/b][/u]: i have made pet scrolls once you recieve one you can do ::pet wich will spawn you 1 of 113 pets and more will be added. your pet will be 100% random. the pets last forever or at least until you dismiss it or die.
[u][b]PERSONAL SHOPS[/b][/u]: i have added personal shops for example at home you can do ::myshop and add your items you wanna sell to your shop for whatever price you wish to sell them for. at any time anyone from around the map (not including wildy, dungeoneering or fun pk ect.) can view your shop by doing ::open (persons username) and buy items. once somone has bought an item from your shop it will send you an alert message saying you have x amount of cash to collect. if you have money to collect or items in your shop and then log off the items and cash will still be ready for you when you log in.
[u][b]FUN PK[/b][/u]:we have the origanal fun pk to fight your friends risk free, but we also have a fun pk portal that does not allow you to bring in items. and once teleported into the fun pk area it transforms you into an awesome knight depending on your combat level.
[u][b]BOSSES[/b][/u]: nex and yes nex does drop torva and other nex armors. kbd kalphite queens avatar of distruction. mad mummy nomad angry goblin godwars bosses theres more just cant think of all of them.
[u][b]ALL SKILLS ARE TRAINABLE[/b][/u] completionist cape and max cape are added with emotes veterans cape added with emote with countdown to recieve it.
[u][b]Hourly Chest[/b][/u] [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/4603/hourlychest.png[/img]
[u][b]PETS[/b][/u] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/8473/petsy.png[/img]
[u][b]PERSONAL SHOPS[/b][/u] [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/3533/personalshop.png[/img]
[u][b]BOSSES[/b][/u] [img]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/3533/personalshop.png[/img]
[u][b]SKILLS[/b][/u] [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/2646/skillssw.png[/img]
[u][b]FUN PK[/b][/u] [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/9682/funpk.png[/img]
[u][b]CHRISTMAS IMP[/b][/u] [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/5905/xmasimp.png[/img]
[u][b]ZOMBIE MINIGAME[/b][/u] spend the points at the zombie point shop. [img]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/3070/zombiegame.png[/img]
[u][b]NOMAD MINIGAME[/b][/u] try to get chaotics and always get a random amount of money. [img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/1851/nomadq.png[/img]
[u][b]CURSES[/b][/u] [img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/6319/cursesc.png[/img]
[u][b]GAMBLING!!![/b][/u] [img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/1131/gamble.png[/img]
[u][b]DONATOR ZONE[/b][/u] i dont do to much with donator stuff just cuz i like people to be equal. only donator only options at this time is ::yell (talk global) ::god (float in the air and fly like superman) ::sissy (stand and run like a little sissy) ::drunk (drink a keg and stand and walk drunk) donator zone, donator chest, and a donator shop that doesnt have any over powered items just basic fancy stuff like full royal ect. [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/7447/donatorzone.png[/img]
[u][b]DUNGEONEERING[/b][/u] no items can go in, once your in you will get money to spend in dungeoneering shops (diff shops per level) [img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/8177/dungeoneering.png[/img]
[u][b]Change the screen size...[/b][/u] [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/7228/screenpo.png[/img]
i will add more very soon =] have some stuff i gotta do this server is brand new this is the first advertisment. hope you enjoy please if you hate dont leave me any gay comments cuz i really dont give a shit about your 2 sence.
click link to play[url=http://runemigrant.webs.com/play-webclient]http://runemigrant.webs.com/play-webclient[/url]
please if theres anything els you would like to know about rune migrant please ask in a comment and ill edit the post with your answers

item.title: Rune Migrant!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Looks good but i only dislike the chest.
It will fuck up eco. Maybe make that you get an decent amount of points.
And with that points you can buy stuff?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Migrant!
item.dc:creator: @freddie_griner freddie griner
item.description:
@freddie_griner wrote:

i have been working on this server for a long time. its original base is insanityx but its an older insanity.

click link to playhttp://runemigrant.webs.com/play-webclient

FEATURES

HOURLY CHEST: each hour of playing time you get to open a chest that will give you a random amount of money from 100k-4m and also a random item including dragon masks, animal masks, dragon (or), dragon (spk), 3rd age, colored whips, colored dark bows, pet scrolls wich i will tell you about down further. and tons more.

PET SCROLLS: i have made pet scrolls once you recieve one you can do ::pet wich will spawn you 1 of 113 pets
and more will be added. your pet will be 100% random. the pets last forever or at least until you dismiss it or die.

PERSONAL SHOPS: i have added personal shops for example at home you can do ::myshop and add your items
you wanna sell to your shop for whatever price you wish to sell them for. at any time anyone from around the map (not including wildy, dungeoneering or fun pk ect.) can view your shop by doing ::open (persons username) and buy items. once
somone has bought an item from your shop it will send you an alert message saying you have x amount of cash to collect.
if you have money to collect or items in your shop and then log off the items and cash will still be ready for you when you
log in.

FUN PK:we have the origanal fun pk to fight your friends risk free, but we also have a fun pk portal that does
not allow you to bring in items. and once teleported into the fun pk area it transforms you into an awesome knight depending
on your combat level.

BOSSES:
nex and yes nex does drop torva and other nex armors.
kbd
kalphite queens
avatar of distruction.
mad mummy
nomad
angry goblin
godwars bosses
theres more just cant think of all of them.

ALL SKILLS ARE TRAINABLE
completionist cape and max cape are added with emotes
veterans cape added with emote with countdown to recieve it.

Hourly Chest

PETS

PERSONAL SHOPS

BOSSES

SKILLS

FUN PK

CHRISTMAS IMP

ZOMBIE MINIGAME spend the points at the zombie point shop.

NOMAD MINIGAME try to get chaotics and always get a random amount of money.

CURSES

GAMBLING!!!

DONATOR ZONE
i dont do to much with donator stuff just cuz i like people to be equal. only donator only options at this time is ::yell (talk global)
::god (float in the air and fly like superman) ::sissy (stand and run like a little sissy) ::drunk (drink a keg and stand and walk drunk) donator zone, donator chest, and a donator shop that doesnt have any over powered items just basic fancy stuff like full royal ect.

DUNGEONEERING no items can go in, once your in you will get money to spend in dungeoneering shops (diff shops per level)

Change the screen size…

i will add more very soon =] have some stuff i gotta do this server is brand new this is the first advertisment. hope you enjoy
please if you hate dont leave me any gay comments cuz i really dont give a shit about your 2 sence.

click link to playhttp://runemigrant.webs.com/play-webclient

please if theres anything els you would like to know about rune migrant please ask in a comment and ill edit the post with your answers

Read full topic
